body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<polUni>
	<fvTenant descr="description" name="test1_tenant">
		<fvAp descr="description" name="test1_app" prio="unspecified" status="created,modified">
		</fvAp>
		<fvAp descr="description" name="test2_app" prio="unspecified" status="created,modified">
		</fvAp>
	</fvTenant>
</polUni>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<polUni>
	<fvTenant name="test1_tenant" >	
		<fvBD unkMcastAct="flood" unkMacUcastAct="proxy" unicastRoute="yes" name="test1_bd" multiDstPktAct="bd-flood"  limitIpLearnToSubnets="no" descr="" arpFlood="no" status="created,modified">
			<fvRsCtx tnFvCtxName=""/>
			<fvRsIgmpsn tnIgmpSnoopPolName=""/>
			<fvRsBdToEpRet tnFvEpRetPolName="" resolveAct="resolve"/>
			<fvSubnet ctrl="" descr="" ip="10.200.1.1/24" name="" preferred="no" scope=""/>
		</fvBD>
		<fvBD unkMcastAct="flood" unkMacUcastAct="proxy" unicastRoute="yes" name="test2_bd" multiDstPktAct="bd-flood"  limitIpLearnToSubnets="no" descr="" arpFlood="no" status="created,modified">
			<fvRsCtx tnFvCtxName=""/>
			<fvRsIgmpsn tnIgmpSnoopPolName=""/>
			<fvRsBdToEpRet tnFvEpRetPolName="" resolveAct="resolve"/>
			<fvSubnet ctrl="" descr="" ip="10.200.2.1/24" name="" preferred="no" scope=""/>
		</fvBD>
	</fvTenant>
</polUni>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<polUni>
	<fvTenant name="test1_tenant" status="created,modified">
		<fvCtx descr="" knwMcastAct="permit" name="test1_vrf" pcEnfPref="enforced" status="created,modified">
			<fvRsBgpCtxPol tnBgpCtxPolName="default"/>
			<fvRsCtxToExtRouteTagPol tnL3extRouteTagPolName="default"/>
			<fvRsOspfCtxPol tnOspfCtxPolName=""/>
			<vzAny descr="" matchT="AtleastOne" name=""/>
			<fvRsCtxToEpRet tnFvEpRetPolName="default"/>
		</fvCtx>
		<fvCtx descr="" knwMcastAct="permit" name="test2_vrf" pcEnfPref="enforced" status="created,modified">
			<fvRsBgpCtxPol tnBgpCtxPolName="default"/>
			<fvRsCtxToExtRouteTagPol tnL3extRouteTagPolName="default"/>
			<fvRsOspfCtxPol tnOspfCtxPolName=""/>
			<vzAny descr="" matchT="AtleastOne" name=""/>
			<fvRsCtxToEpRet tnFvEpRetPolName="default"/>
		</fvCtx>
	</fvTenant>
</polUni>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<polUni>
	<fvTenant name="test1_tenant">
		<fvAp prio="unspecified" descr = "" name="test1_app">
			<fvAEPg prio="unspecified" name="test1_epg" matchT="AtleastOne" descr="" status="created,modified">
        			<fvRsCustQosPol tnQosCustomPolName=""/>
        			<fvRsBd tnFvBDName="" />
        			<fvRsDomAtt tDn="uni/phys-test1_phys_dom" instrImedcy="immediate" encap="unknown" resImedcy="immediate" />
			</fvAEPg>
			<fvAEPg prio="unspecified" name="test2_epg" matchT="AtleastOne" descr="" status="created,modified">
        			<fvRsCustQosPol tnQosCustomPolName=""/>
        			<fvRsBd tnFvBDName="" />
        			<fvRsDomAtt tDn="uni/phys-test1_phys_dom" instrImedcy="immediate" encap="unknown" resImedcy="immediate" />
			</fvAEPg>
		</fvAp>
		<fvAp prio="unspecified" descr = "" name="test2_app">
			<fvAEPg prio="unspecified" name="test3_epg" matchT="AtleastOne" descr="" status="created,modified">
        			<fvRsCustQosPol tnQosCustomPolName=""/>
        			<fvRsBd tnFvBDName="" />
        			<fvRsDomAtt tDn="uni/phys-test1_phys_dom" instrImedcy="immediate" encap="unknown" resImedcy="immediate" />
			</fvAEPg>
			<fvAEPg prio="unspecified" name="test4_epg" matchT="AtleastOne" descr="" status="created,modified">
        			<fvRsCustQosPol tnQosCustomPolName=""/>
        			<fvRsBd tnFvBDName="" />
        			<fvRsDomAtt tDn="uni/phys-test1_phys_dom" instrImedcy="immediate" encap="unknown" resImedcy="immediate" />
			</fvAEPg>
		</fvAp>
	</fvTenant>
</polUni>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<polUni>
        <fvTenant name="test1_tenant">
		<fvAp prio="unspecified" descr = "" name="test1_app">
			<fvAEPg prio="unspecified" name="test1_epg" matchT="AtleastOne" >
				<fvRsPathAtt descr="" tDn="topology/pod-1/paths-1201/pathep-[test1_int_pol_group]" mode="regular" instrImedcy="immediate" encap="vlan-101" status="created,modified"/>
			</fvAEPg>
			<fvAEPg prio="unspecified" name="test2_epg" matchT="AtleastOne" >
				<fvRsPathAtt descr="" tDn="topology/pod-1/protpaths-1201-1202/pathep-[test2_int_pol_group]" mode="regular" instrImedcy="immediate" encap="vlan-101" status="created,modified"/>
			</fvAEPg>
		</fvAp>
	</fvTenant>
</polUni>
